root.name: Archon Classic
root.description: OverviewInspired by chess, but adding combat that you control, Archon was the original Battle Chess. You must try to outmaneuver your opponent using teams of fantasy creatures or monsters in this epic struggle of Light and Dark. Conquer your opponent by defeating all of their pieces on the chess board or claim all the Power SquaresThe game can be played using a controller and supports ladders and leaderboards.PC System RequirementsOS: Win XP or later with .NET framework installedProcessor: x86-compatible 800 mhzMemory: 512 MBGraphics: At least 64MB memoryHard Drive: 250 MB
